body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarFix Experts. My name is Joseph Russell and I will be assisting you today. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi Alexis, thank you for sharing your name. To assist you better, could you please provide me with your phone number? Please spell it out digit by digit.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure. It's seven zero three, five five five, four one six seven.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for the details. Additionally, may I also have your email address for our records? Please provide your email slowly, character by character.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course. It's a as in alpha, l as in lima, e as in echo, x as in x-ray, i as in india, s as in sierra, dot m as in mike, o as in oscar, r as in romeo, g as in golf, a as in alpha, n as in november at g mail dot com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Alexis, for providing your contact information. We'll review your billing concern and get back to you shortly. If you have any other concerns, feel free to ask. Your time and patience are appreciated.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you for your assistance, Joseph. I look forward to your response. Have a great day.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Alexis. Have a wonderful day as well. Goodbye.
